title: Sri Lanka records 11 more deaths from Covid-19
body_lines: The Director-General of Health Services has confirmed another 11 coronavirus-related deaths for March 07, increasing the official Covid-19 death toll in Sri Lanka to 16,361.
This figure includes 04 males and 07 female patients, according to the Government Information Department.
Three of the victims are between the ages of 30-59 years. The remaining 08 are persons over the age of 60 years.
